title: Barbecue Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 red onion, sliced', '6 rashers streaky bacon', '1 portion fresh pizza dough', '175ml barbecue sauce', '2 cooked chicken breast fillets, shredded', '4 tablespoons crumbled Gorgonzola cheese', '1-2 green chillies, seeded and diced or to taste', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '225g Mozzarella cheese, grated']
